feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas appropriately and have a similar style of punctuation with no major differences.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical and grammatical features with consistent word choice and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are relatively similar in complexity and length, showing coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a neutral tone and straightforward narrative style, lacking distinct common expressions or idioms.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free of spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, tone, and error-free writing, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
